thread.title: Jenny Parker
thread.title_full: Car Mats UK reviewed by Jenny Parker

author: Jenny Parker
title: Jenny Parker
text: I bought a set of mats for my polo match. Its a brand new car and assumed mats would come with it. But no! I refused to pay nearly Â£90 so I found Car Mats Uk and bought a black carpet set. They are perfect in every way. They fit perfectly and look great. They are made to a very high standard and at a fraction of the price. I'm so pleased I bought them as it adds both comfort and practicality to my car. I would highly recommend these. Thanks.
